name: The Crazy Quest For Free Wi-Fi
name_original: The Crazy Quest For Free Wi-Fi
description:
(Based on real events)

Go on a quest to retrieve parts to fix and upgrade your internet connection, by going on an adventure! (DEMO availible now for Free!)

Minimum requirements(That were tested to run at 60FPS):

Intel Core 2 Duo (2.93Hz)

Nvidia Gforce GT 220

Windows Vista or newer
